title: Is doing MCA worth in PESSAT?
content: I'm planning to join PESSAT to pursue MCA So, Can someone let me know the Fees structure, Packages/Placements and their opinion on studying MCA in PESSAT,

comments.body: Fees are 2.5lakh PA for PESSAT, I'd suggest you write PGCET instead and secure rank under or around 300 if you wanna reduce the fees.
But how much does the fees gets reduced if my PGCET ranking falls under 300
Ok thank you very much bro üôåüèº this helped me a lot
I'd say stay away from PES, join RV or BMS or Christ, that's your safest bet. i heard that placements suck at PES for MCA

Not worth it at all. Placement sucks for MCA! Not even 20 got placed out of 240 this year. Go for some other colleges! Fees for PESSAT is above 2.5 L. Infrastructure is awesome, Student vibes are good, But if you're joining for MCA! Don't think about placements. If you're from Karnataka, Try coming through PGCET quota otherwise spending lakhs is not worth it at all!
